title: i made this kayn login screen

embed.description: i made this one cuz riot didn't make an actual animated login based on the splash art and i think it's really cool splash art that's why i made this one :D tell me if you like it and comment what should i make next !

body: made this today i hoep you guys like it <3

replies.body: That blue on the left side seems out of place to me. If you were to make it more subtle I think it would look a lot better
yeah i tried to cover the left side :D and thank you <3

Looks nice.
Now kayn can wield chidori AND amaterasu 
Jokes aside looks pretty good xD
I am so happy you used shadow of mordor music.
at least i'm not the only one who loves Shadow of mordor ost <3
I think id like it more if kayn was actually balanced :^)

Smiles*

You didn't think I wouldn't notice that Shadow of Mordor title screen theme did you ma BOI!

Now that i think about it Kayn and Talion are quite alike.

Talion and Kayn are all about stealth and inner peace while Raast and Celebrimbor are all about KILL, DESTROY, EXTERMINATE! EXTERMINATE!
lol yeah i'm thinking the same :'D

Looks like a real Riot Login Screen to me! 

Only part of it that bothers me personally is how often the eye blinks. I'm not at all an artsy person though, so maybe it blinking less would have looked weird, but that's the only part of it that really feels off to me.
i think because it's short looped video . and thank you for your kind words <3
Nice, it also reminds me how I thought Shadow Assassin and Rhaast were his parents who helped him as spirits :^)

It's so cool!
That blue effect looks a little too loud for the style and color balance of the image, but the rest is really good
also, you chose very nice music for it!
love the Shadow of Mordor music :D
i'll try to add it on wallpaper engine
